raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

The EC 50 for protection was approximately 300 μg/ml.
N18 neuroblastoma cells were treated with the general nitric oxide synthase (NOS) inhibitor, N<sup>G</sup>-methyl-L-arginine (L-NMA, 100 μM, Calbiochem, La Jolla, CA)
The cells were pre- or co-treated with the NOS inhibitors in conjunction with SN infection, with or without arginase treatment (2.5 μg/ml).
Figure 2 A also demonstrates that N18 neuroblastoma cell survival increased to about 90% of control at the arginase concentration of 2 μg/ml.
Addition of asparaginase (1-5 U/ml) to Sindbis virus infected cells increased cell survival to about 65% of control.
